altTitles.ja: 「おかえり、パパ」

altTitles.en: “Welcome Back, Papa”
“Welcome Home, Papa”
Welcome Back, Papa

description.en: A high school girl is trying to get obsessively close to her kind stepdad. Even going as far as watching him in bed with her mom.
description.ru:
У женщины, на которой я женился, есть дочь. Её зовут Тоуко и она второкурсница старшей школы.
Я заволновался, когда узнал, что у меня появится дочь-подросток, но я рад, что, похоже, понравился ей.

Но был один странный момент, когда расстояние между нами стало слишком близким?..

"Пожалуйста, позаботься обо мне с этого момента, папа ♡"

Я уверен, что никто не знает, кто этот ребёнок на самом деле.
description.pt-br: A mulher com quem me casei tem uma filha, uma estudante do segundo ano chamada Toru Sakurako.  Fiquei preocupada quando soube que a filha dela ainda era uma garota do ensino médio, então fiquei feliz em ver que nos demos bem. Mas às vezes, Toru parecia chegar um pouco perto demais...?

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.en: Dr. Devil

description.en: Ye Wutian, a brilliant doctor from 2089, somehow time-travels back to the year 2019 in a lab experiment explosion. He wakes up in a wild mountain, and then manages to save a girl, Li Wan'er who's been bitten by a venomous snake. With his apparently superior knowledge in medicine, Ye Wutian embarks on an amazing journey in the beginning of the 21st century…

altTitles.en: Mid-Ut

description.en:
As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

altTitles.ja: のあ先輩はともだち。

altTitles.en: Noa is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

description.en: Dionysus- the young boy who grew up on a small island with no memory of his family and his constant strange nightmares and dreams. One day, Dionysus decided to go on a journey to find his family and discover who he really was, alongside the love of his life, Ariadne.

altTitles.ja: 犬飼さん家の押しかけJK

altTitles.en: JK Barging Into Inukai's House

description.en: One day, the thirty-something salaryman Inukai met a high school girl Komugi who claimed to be the reincarnation of his childhood dog. Now she comes over every day looking to play with her owner, but her pet antics don't seem so innocent in human form! A semi-cohabitation comedy between a dog-girl and a single office worker!
description.ja: アラサー独身サラリーマンの犬飼はある日、こむぎと名乗る女子高生に出会う。こむぎは自身を犬飼の愛犬の生まれ変わりだと言い、毎日彼の家に通い詰める…！

altTitles.vi: Sơn Ca Yêu Kiều Của Yêu Tinh

altTitles.ja: 優しい夜叉の鳥

altTitles.th: ท่านภูตใจดีกับนกไนติงเกล

description.en:
"Won't you become a Goblin's bride?"   
  
In Yang-an, the capital of the Shun Dynasty Empire, there are rumors of a Goddess who sings a song that grants your wishes in your dreams if you visit a certain pharmacy. To confirm this, Sa Heonyoung, who disguises his status as a member of the royal family, goes to find the Goddess of the rumors. After listening to her song, he yearns for her, as if he is suffering from an illness…  
  
A man who must kill his own identity under a goblin's mask; and a woman who has no name or a lover, and lives only for the revenge in her mother's will. A mournful love story between a man and a woman who are the only ones who can fully understand each other.

description.ko:
"도깨비의 신부가 되지 않겠습니까?“

순나라의 황도 양안. 어느 약방에 찾아가면 신녀가 꿈속에서 소원을 이뤄 주는 노래를 불러 준다는 소문이 파다하다. 이를 검증하기 위해 신분을 속인 채 다른 이들 틈에 섞여 신녀를 찾아간 친왕, 사헌영. 그는 신녀의 노래를 듣고 난 뒤, 병을 앓듯 그녀를 찾게 되는데….

도깨비 가면을 쓴 채 자신을 죽이고 살아가야만 하는 남자. 외로운 산 속에서 하루 하루 죽음만을 기다리며 살아가는 이름 없는 여자. 온전히 자신을 알아주는 건 서로밖에 없는 남녀의 애절한 사랑 이야기.

description.zh-hk:
「妳願意當鬼怪的新娘嗎？」順王朝的帝都仰安有個傳聞，城裡某間藥房有一位能用歌聲讓人在夢中願望成真的巫女。為了證實這個傳聞，順王朝親王──思軒英，隱瞞自身身分親自去見了這位巫女，然而在聽完巫女的歌聲後，彷彿得了相思病一般，一直不斷找她…。一位只能戴著鬼怪面具隱藏自己真實身分的男子、一位在孤寂的山中等待死亡日度一日的女子，相遇後發現真正理解自己的只有彼此，一則關於男女愛戀情愁的故事。【​本作品為官方正式授權之15歲版本，請讀者們多多支持。】​

title.en: I Thought My Time Was Up!

altTitles.en: I Thought I Didn't Have Long to Live!
I Thought It Was Time!

description.en:
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanchett, was told she only had three months left to live. She decided that she didn't want to go quietly, so she decided to create and complete her bucket list! 

1. Treat her maid Anne to cakes
2. Gain independence and wealth
3. Get rid of her fiancé, the Marquis of Secreb
4. Date someone handsome for three months
5. Take a trip to the West!

...But it was only after she ran away that she realised... the fact her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanche, was diagnosed with a terminal illness and three months left to live. She decided to try to achieve her bucket list since she was going to die anyway. First, dumping an older fiancé whom she doesn't even love. Second, dating the monster Duke of Candel for three months! But it was only after she ran away from him that she realized, the fact that her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=825581), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4502291)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9021824), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801711)

description.ko:
3개월 시한부 진단을 받은 공녀, 라리에트. 어차피 죽을 몸, 버킷리스트(라 쓰고 미친 짓이라 읽는) 달성을 해보기로 했다. 

첫째. 약혼자를 엿 먹이기. 
둘째. 괴물 공작 아스라한과 3개월 간 연애하기!  

그러나 그에게서 도망치고 나서야 깨닫고 말았다. 시한부 진단이 완벽한 오진이라는 사실을!

---

description.tr:
Leydi Lariet’e bir hastalık tanısı koyulmuş ve üç aylık ömrü kaldığı söylenmişti. “Zaten öleceğim, o halde aklımdan geçen her şeyi yapabilirim!” diye düşünen leydi, nişanlısına postayı koyup acımasız dükle bir ilişkiye başlamıştı. Olacakları işler çığırından çıkmadan önce bilemezdi. Aslında kendisine yanlış bir teşhis konulmuş, kısıtlı ömrü kalmamıştı! Bay Asrazan gülümsedi ve… “Şimdi kaçmaya çalışırsan bunun bedelini ödemek zorunda kalırsın.”

description.zh:
生命只剩最后三个月？
那我要和怪物公爵谈恋爱！
得知自己的生命只剩下三个月的拉丽爱特,想着反正自己活不长，索性在死之前完成自己的愿望清单!首先解决掉未婚夫老头儿，其次和怪物公爵埃斯拉翰谈三个月的恋爱!但逃离他身边之后，拉丽爱特才知道，自己的病竟然是…？!

title.en: Sagishi to Keisatsukan no Rennai Kyori

altTitles.ja: 詐欺師と警察官の恋愛距離

altTitles.en: The Love Gap Between a Con Man and a Policewoman

altTitles.vi: Khoảng cách tình yêu giữa chàng lừa đảo và nàng cảnh sát

description.en: Scammer Seiichi Sagino's mission this time is to stop Ren Karasuma, a police officer with a sharper sense of crime. At the beginning of their encounter, Sagino is told that he smells like a criminal. Will this action lead to unexpected developments...?

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

altTitles.en: Cloud (Paskim)

description.en: Skylar has a secret hobby - taking photos of his crush, Chan-il. But when Cirrus stumbles upon Skylar's cloud storage with its impressive collection of Chan-il's photos, things escalate pretty quickly. At first confident his secret is safe with Cirrus, Skylar continuously finds himself in compromising situations, making him question Cirrus' true motives
description.uk:
У Ханиля є таємне хобі - фотографувати своє нерозділене кохання, Чаниля. Але коли Хьонун натикається на хмарне сховище Ханиля, з його вражаючою колекцією фотографій, ситуація досить швидко загострюється.
Чи збереже Хьонун секрет? Що він задумав?
description.pt-br: Skylar tem um hobby secreto - tirar fotos de sua paixão, Chan-il. Mas quando Cirrus se depara com o armazenamento de nuvem de Skylar com sua impressionante coleção de fotos de Chan-il, as coisas começam a andar muito rapidamente. A princípio confiante de que seu segredo está seguro com Cirrus, Skylar continuamente se encontra em situações comprometedoras, fazendo-o questionar os verdadeiros motivos de Cirrus.

description.en:
She grew up an orphan, working herself to death in part-time jobs, and eventually died from exhaustion. 

Right before her death, she was reading an R-rated romance fantasy novel and found herself reincarnated as Annette Ethelred, the twisted villainess who was adopted into a duke's family and was bent on killing the novel's heroine. Annette was also the last princess of a fallen kingdom. Her happiness over the lavish lifestyle of the duke’s family didn’t last long, as she was quickly thrown out with nothing to her name, punished for the evil deeds of the original Annette. 

But giving up wasn’t an option. With the survival skills honed from all her part-time jobs, she managed to get hired as a maid at the temple. 

"This time around, I’ll make lots of money and date a handsome man! ...But seriously, are there no normal guys around here?!"

title.en: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku ~Saikyou nano wa Fuyou Zaiko no Item deshita~

altTitles.ja: 召喚された賢者は異世界を往く ～最強なのは不要在庫のアイテムでした～

altTitles.en: A Sage Is Summoned to Another World: The Undesired Items Are Now the Strongest

altTitles.es-la: El sabio es invocado a otro mundo ~Los artículos más fuertes eran los menos deseados del inventario~

altTitles.ko: 소환된 현자는 이세계를 누빈다 ~최강인 것은 필요없는 재고 아이템이었습니다~

altTitles.zh-hk: 被召喚的賢者前往異世界～廢棄庫存道具才是最強～

altTitles.zh: 被召唤的贤者前往异世界～废弃库存道具才是最强～

altTitles.en: Wise Man Is Summoned to Another World ~The Strongest Items Were Those Less Desired in Inventory~

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9275ei/) (Japanese)

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…

altTitles.ja: 百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love Struggles.

altTitles.vi: Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ

altTitles.pt-br: O Primeiro Amor de Momose Akira em Ruínas

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love Is Coming Apart.

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés du premier amour de Momose Akira.

altTitles.ru: Первая любовь Акиры Момосе терпит крах.

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love is a Failure.

altTitles.es: El primer amor de Momose Akira se derrumba.

altTitles.vi: Mối tình đầu đầy trắc trở của Momose Akira

description.en:
Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire.

Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach.

And there was a “fate” that was more than he could have imagined.
description.es:
Kugayama Hajime, un chico que vive en el campo, se reencuentra con su antigua compañera de clase Momose Akira, a la que solía admirar.

Justo cuando está a punto de observarla desde lejos y disfrutar de su agridulce juventud, Akira se acerca de forma inesperada.

Y el "destino" es mucho más de lo que él pudo haberse imaginado.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja:
ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。

彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。

そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。

2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.pl: Kugayama Hajime, chłopiec mieszkający na wsi, spotyka swoją dawną koleżankę z klasy, Momose Akiry, którą podziwiał. Gdy tylko zamierza obserwować ją z daleka i cieszyć się swoją słodko-gorzką młodością, Akira niespodziewanie zbliża się do niego. A za tym kryło się „przeznaczenie”, którego nie mógł sobie nawet wyobrazić.
description.ru: Жизнь Хадзимэ Кугаямы, мальчишки из глухой деревушки, круто меняется, когда в его жизнь возвращается бывшая одноклассница и когда-то недосягаемая мечта — Акира Момосэ. Он планировал просто наблюдать за ней издалека и наслаждаться воспоминаниями о своей юности... Но неожиданно Акира делает первый шаг навстречу. И вот тут начинается нечто гораздо большее, чем он мог себе представить. Следите за их историей и согревайте свои сердца вместе с ними.
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de escola por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

altTitles.ja: 妻、小学生になる。
If my wife become an elementary school student.

altTitles.en: If My Wife Became an Elementary School Student.
My Wife Became An Elementary School Student.

altTitles.es: Mi esposa volvió a la escuela primaria

altTitles.es-la: Si mi esposa renaciera como una estudiante de primaria

altTitles.fr: Ma femme s'est réincarnée en écolière

altTitles.ja: 妻小

altTitles.vi: Vợ tôi là Học sinh Tiểu Học

description.en: The trials and tribulations of a single father, who one day meets the reincarnation of his deceased wife, who perished a decade before.
description.es:
Las pruebas y adversidades de un padre soltero, que un día se encuentra con la reencarnación de su difunta esposa, que murió una década antes.  
  


---

Links  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yayu_murata)
description.es-la: Nijima Keisuke es un hombre asalariado, vivía felizmente junto a su esposa y a su hija, hasta que un día su esposa fallece y él se derrumba. Siendo ahora un padre soltero, tuvo que esforzarse más por su hija pero perdía el camino y su estilo de vida se volvió muy deplorable, hasta que un día aparece una niña diciendo ser la reencarnación de su esposa y se propone ayudarlo para cambiar y corregir su lamentable situación actual.
description.pt-br: As provações e tribulações de um pai solteiro, que um dia encontra a reencarnação de sua falecida esposa.

altTitles.en: Petals of Reincarnation

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…

title.en: All Four Seasons of the Keyaki Sisters

altTitles.ja: 欅姉妹の四季
All four seasons of the Keyaki sisters.

description.en: Follows the daily life of the 4 Keyaki sisters. Mutsumi, the oldest sister, is an excellent cook and has a loud voice. The second oldest, Akemi, is a beauty who likes to read books. The third, Izumi, is a cheerful and straightfoward sporty girl. Hitomi, the youngest sister, is a tidy and graceful girl who is good at knitting.

When the ruthless Lord Tiwakan seizes the kingdom of Nauk, Princess Liene Arsac faces an impossible choice: marry her captor or watch her homeland crumble. But Lord Tiwakan isn’t just after power; he desires Liene, and his devotion stirs a mix of fear and undeniable attraction within her. With her former betrothed, Lafitte, still missing, Liene must decide whether to trust Tiwakan's promises or hold out hope for a rescue. As dangerous secrets come to light, Liene’s decision could change the fate of Nauk—and her own heart—forever.
description.pl: Kiedy bezwzględny lord Tiwakan przejmuje królestwo Nauk, księżniczka Liene Arsac staje przed niemożliwym wyborem: poślubić swojego porywacza lub patrzeć, jak jej ojczyzna się rozpada. Ale lord Tiwakan pragnie nie tylko władzy; pożąda Liene, a jego oddanie wzbudza w niej mieszankę strachu i niezaprzeczalnego przyciągania. Ponieważ jej były narzeczony, Lafitte, wciąż jest uznawany za zaginionego, Liene musi zdecydować, czy zaufać obietnicom Tiwakana, czy też mieć nadzieję na ratunek. Gdy niebezpieczne sekrety wychodzą na jaw, decyzja Liene może zmienić los Nauk - i jej własnego serca - na zawsze.

altTitles.en: The Fox Always Lies
The Fox's Never-Ending Lies

description.en:
Tang Ran is a bright and cheerful little fox spirit. To graduate from the Monster Academy, she transforms into a human college student hoping to seduce a human and make them fall in love with her. However, little does she know that the reserved human female professor she has a crush on, Su Qingci, is actually a…

One lie leads to another. To make the other person fall in love with them first, the fox must spin an endless web of “lies.”

altTitles.en: Accidental Love

description.en: The stunning financial reporter, Zheng Shuyi, is dating a two-timing scumbag? How could she possibly stand back and do nothing about those love birds: the cheating bastard and his white lotus of a mistress. Upon seeing the Rolls-Royce's plate number of the mistress' uncle, which was a straight numerical number plate, Zheng Shuyi made up her mind. Doesn't the cheater plan to marry rich to retire twenty years early, by going down the laughable CEO route? Then I shall become both you and your mistress' aunt!

altTitles.ja: 聖なる乙女と秘めごとを

altTitles.en: Doing Secret Things with the Holy Maidens
The Holy Maiden and the Secret

altTitles.zh-hk: 與聖潔少女們的不可告人之事

altTitles.zh: 与圣洁少女们的不可告人之事

altTitles.vi: Bí mật của những trinh nữ thiêng liêng

description.en:
"Please teach us naughty things."

One day, Itsuki is transported to another world, where he is confronted by sisters who serve the goddess. In order to return to the real world, he must give them practical sex education!
description.ja:
「私たちに学びを…えっちなことをお教えください」

――ある日、異世界に転移してしまったイツキの前に現れたのは、女神に仕えるシスター達。現世に戻るには、彼女たちに性教育の実技指導を行わなくてはならなくて！？

altTitles.ja: 三角形の壊し方

altTitles.en: How to Break a Triangle

description.en:
Koto, Aya, and Erika were secretly in love with each other.

Koto's thoughts reach Aya for a short while, but Aya disappears as if she had been spirited away.

Seven years later, however, Aya appears to Koto and Erika as she was then...

title.en: A Red Laurel To My Emperor

altTitles.zh-hk: 為我的皇帝獻上紅月桂花

altTitles.en: Red Laurel Flowers to My Emperor

description.en: Laurel Neales, the first princess of Tortia, has been married off to the emperor of Kairos following a political feud that ended with the assassination of her parents. Undiscouraged by the circumstances, Laurel refuses to give in to becoming yet another of the emperor's concubines. Instead, she plays along with his romantic whims and gains her own form of power in this new life by proposing an offer he cannot refuse: to facilitate his conquest of the land that betrayed her.

altTitles.ja: 異世界車中泊物語 アウトランナーPHEV

altTitles.en: Otherworldly Overnight in the Car: Outrunner PHEV
Sleeping Overnight in my Car in Isekai

description.en:
One young salaryman, who adores his plug-in, hybrid car that uses both electricity and gasoline, had been using camping in it as an escape plan from everyday life. Suddenly, he finds himself transported to another world with his car!

He'll start his life anew in this different world!
description.ja: やさぐれて会社での評価も低いサラリーマン・大前現人（おおまえあらと）。仕事のミスが理由で車に乗って逃亡し、サービスエリアで車中泊して起きたら異世界へ転移してた！そこで出会ったケモミミ娘に仕事観で説教され逆切れした主人公の異世界での前途は如何に！？異世界でのサバイバルで鍛えられたメンタルで、現代日本での仕事で活かせるか！？リアルと異世界の行き来で生き直す！これはそんな物語です。

altTitles.ja: 描くなるうえは

description.en: Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring. The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?
description.id: Uehara-kun menyukai karakter 2 dimensi dan mempunyai cita-cita menjadi mangaka! Namun, mimpinya pupus saat seorang editor menolak manga-nya karena bikin ngantuk. Besoknya, dia berencana membuang manga yang ditolak tersebut, namun, salah satu gadis dari kelasnya, Miyamoto Niina, mengetahui manga hasil buatannya, timbulah kisah komedi-romantis yang terjalin dari sebuah manga!
description.ja: 2次元をこよなく愛する上原くんの夢は漫画家！ ある日、同じクラスのギャル宮本さんに自分の原稿を見られたことで漫画のための距離感近すぎ疑似恋愛、開始!?
description.vi:
Uehara-kun là một thằng rất thích gái 2D và ước mơ làm hoạ sĩ Manga! Tuy nhiên, giấc mơ của anh ta lại ngay lập tức bị đạp đổ khi bị một biên tập viên nhận xét rằng tác phẩm này nhìn chán chả buồn nói.

Tưởng như anh đã định từ bỏ giấc mơ của mình thì một cô gái trong lớp của anh, Miyamoto Niina, nhìn thấy bản phác thảo của cậu ấy và muốn bắt đầu một mối tình tưởng lãng mạn nhưng ai ngờ là giả tạo, để giúp cậu hoàn thành được bộ manga của mình!

Một bộ manga về Mangaka ✖ Romcom tuổi mới lớn!
description.pt-br:
Uehara-kun, que adora 2D, sonha em se tornar um mangaká um dia! No entanto, seu sonho é ameaçado quando um editor rejeita seu trabalho por considerá-lo muito chato.

No dia seguinte, enquanto pensa em desistir de seu sonho, uma garota de sua turma, Miyamoto Niina, vê seu manuscrito, e um pseudo-romance muito próximo para o bem de seus mangás começa!?

Esta é uma comédia romântica juvenil de quadrinistas!

title.en: Teihen Ossan, Cheat Kokusei de Isekai Rakuraku Life

altTitles.ja: 底辺おっさん、チート覚醒で異世界楽々ライフ

altTitles.en: Bottom-Tier Old Man, Living the Easy Life in Another World with Cheat Powers

description.en: Reincarnated from a bottom-tier salaryman to an adventurer, he possessed only one skill: [Game]. A seemingly dead-end second life enveloped in games even in another world…
description.ja: 底辺サラリーマンから底辺冒険者へ転生するが、持っていたスキルは【ゲーム】。異世界に来てまでゲーム三昧の、先がない二度目の人生……。

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.ja: サキュバスがやってきたお話

altTitles.en: The Story of a Succubus Who Came to the Human World

description.en: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

altTitles.ja: 怪獣くん

description.en:
Musashino Art University, Department of Visual Communication Design, 2021 graduation project.

When he was in elementary school, a boy who had been trying to save his childhood friend from being bullied by a bully turned violent.
Now, as a junior high school student, his classmates nickname him "Kaiju-kun" and distance themselves from him.
One day, a girl who is "half Kaiju" joins his class.
She seems to have come to school to make friends with many people......
A heartwarming monster coming-of-age story about the pain of school life and friendship!

title.en: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei LoveCome

altTitles.ja: 英雄と魔女の転生ラブコメ

altTitles.ja-ro: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei Rabu Kome

altTitles.en: A Reincarnation Romantic Comedy of a Hero and a Witch

altTitles.vi: Chuyện tình lãng mạn và hài hước của Anh Hùng và Phù Thủy chuyển sinh
Chuyện tình chuyển sinh hài hước của Anh hùng và Phù thuỷ

description.en:
Choose the world or choose her. 

Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. 

However, that was a story of his past life. 

In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.
description.ja:
世界を選ぶか、彼女を選ぶか。

平凡な高校生・白石護道には『秘密』があった。それは前世の記憶を持っていること。こことは違う別の世界で、人類を救った『英雄』だった。

とはいえ、あくまで前世の話。

今世ではごく普通の学生生活――のはずだったが、転入してきた少女・椎名麻衣の出現で日々は一変する。
description.vi:
Shiraishi Godou, một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường đang có một "Bí mật". Đó là cậu vẫn còn ký ức của tiền thế.
Ở một thế giới khác, Godou đã từng là "Anh hùng" giải cứu nhân loại. Tuy là vậy, nhưng đó là chuyện của tiền thế. Ở thế giới hiện tại, cậu chắc là đang trải qua quãng đời học sinh bình thường, vậy mà sự xuất hiện của cô thiếu nữ vừa chuyển trường đến. Shiina Mai đã làm những ngày yên bình của cậu hoàn toàn thay đổi

altTitles.ja: やばいアイドルのマネージャーになっちゃった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Yabai Aidoru no Manager ni Nacchatta Hanashi

altTitles.en: Yabai Idol and Her Manager

description.en:
Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side...

On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!

An idol with secrets × A caring manager 

Their story begins in the smoking area...
description.ja:
仕方なくマネージャーになって、
初めて担当する大人気アイドル「まろん」には
裏の顔があった...。

舞台上でキラキラしているまろんだが、
私生活ではタバコが手放せない、世話の焼ける変わった女の子。
「完璧なアイドル」まろんの素顔を隠し通すために、
マネージャーとしてサポートしなければ！

裏ありアイドル×世話好きマネージャー
喫煙所から始まる、二人の物語ーー。

altTitles.en: Trump

description.en:
Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

altTitles.ja: レトロゲ

description.en: NES, PlayStation, Sega Saturn...High school girls today, fascinated by the retro games that once captivated the world, passionately discuss their passion for games! Will it be rivalry or friendship that develops between them?!

altTitles.th: ผู้ชนะรักนี้ต้องเป็นฉัน

description.en: Although Captain is handsome, kind, and good at sports, he’s also an avid gamer. That’s the reason why Kiss decided to start learning how to play games in hopes of winning over the senior she has a crush on. However, this turned out to be the beginning of an unexpected online relationship between Kiss and Miguel, who is secretly the world's number one pro player!

altTitles.ja: ナニワトモアレ

altTitles.vi: Dù thế nào đi nữa / đó là tình bạn Naniwa

description.en: Guruguru Osaka, crackling ring! Now, the piston in my crotch is tingling!! I like picking up girls more than having three meals. Naniwa's youthful pleasure of being popular and having sex. I'm not a fart with a big loan either. I want to buy a new Silvia. I don't have the skill (technique), but I can't give up on my lewd spirit. An 18-year-old boy is making his ring debut!!

altTitles.ja: コハエースＥＸ

description.en:
A Holy Grail War has broken out in Koha-Ace!

After managing to avoid getting axed again and again, some miracle has allowed for a third volume of Koha-Ace! The mysterious new Servant designed by Takashi Takeuchi, Sakura Saber, is a storm of romance who will play an active role! We'll show you the real power of Koha-Ace. (Third Volume of Koha-Ace, following Koha-Ace+)

altTitles.ja: バツハレ

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist, Wakou Ichiro, who decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him?
description.ja: ２度目の結婚記念日。仕事を終えて帰宅した和光市路が目撃したのは見知らぬ男と交わる妻の姿だった──！住み慣れた我が家、幸福な日々、そして愛する人を失った和光だったが、そんな彼の前に現れたのは…！？
description.vi: Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, Wakou Ichiro về nhà sớm để kỷ niệm 2 năm ngày cưới với vợ mình. Nhưng bất ngờ khi mở cửa ra thì... Anh phát hiện vợ mình đang làm tình với người đàn ông khác. Cuộc hôn nhân dù ngắn nhưng cũng làm cuộc sống của anh thay đổi một lần nữa. Bất ngờ một cô gái xuất hiện trước mặt anh, câu truyện vừa hài vừa lứng sẽ bắt đầu?
description.es-la: La historia empieza con el protagonista, Wakou Ichiro, quien decida regresar temprano a casa del trabajo para celebrar su segundo aniversario con su esposa. Pero, cuando abre la puerta de su casa... ¡Se encuentra a su esposa siéndole infiel! A pesar de que matrimonio duró muy poco, su vida vuelve a cambiar cuando de repente, frente a él se aparece cierta mujer... ¡Así comienza una nueva historia, una nueva comedía erótica!

title.en: Tensei-saki wa Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag wa Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.ja: 転生先は悪役令嬢の父親でした～可愛い娘の死亡フラグは全部折ります～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei-saki ha Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag ha Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.en: I Was Just Reincarnated As The Villainess's Father ~I'll Snap All Of My Cute Daughter's Death Flags~

description.en: Ryuichi, a 44-year-old single father, gets into a traffic accident while protecting his high school daughter Mizuho, ​​who ran away from home after an argument. After losing consciousness and accepting his death, he finds himself in the body of a young man he had never seen before. While panicking, he finds a girl who looks exactly like Mizuho when she was a child, and as he sorts out the situation, it seems that he has been reincarnated as the father of the game's villainess…!?
description.ja: 44歳のシングルファザーの龍一（りゅういち）は口論の末、家を飛び出した女子高生の娘・瑞穂（みずほ）をかばい、交通事故に遭ってしまう。意識が遠のき死を覚悟した後に目覚めると、見知らぬ若い男性の姿になっていた。動揺する中、小さい頃の瑞穂そっくりな少女がいて、状況を整理していくと、どうやらゲームの悪役令嬢の父親に転生してしまったようで……!?

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

altTitles.ja: 煩悩☆西遊記

description.en: The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story, and centers on the Buddhist priest Genjō and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Gokū, Cho Hakkai, and Sha Gojyo.
description.ja:
真の救済が記されてるという経典を得るため、孫悟空・猪八戒・沙悟浄を共にし、天竺を目指す三蔵法師。

その道のりで襲いかかる試練が
・・・・・・・・全部エロい。

仏の道に生きる三蔵にとっては貞操を失うこと、それ即ち死。果たして三蔵法師は煩悩に打ち克ち、貞操を守り抜けるのか？

title.en: Isekai de Seijo ni Natta no de Kokumin-teki Idol wo Mezashimasu

altTitles.ja: 異世界で聖女になったので国民的アイドルを目指します
寄生列島

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed――. A parasite psycho-thriller by Edogawa Edogawa of "Ikenie Touhyou".

title.en: Mitame Jirai-kei Osananajimi no Ren'ai Story

altTitles.ja: 見た目地雷系幼馴染の恋愛ストーリー

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitame Jirai-kei Osananajimi no Renai Story

altTitles.en: A Love Story About a Childhood Friend Who Looks Like a Landmine Girl
A Landmine-Type-Appearing Childhood Friend's Love Story
My Childhood Friend Who Looks Like a Landmine Type

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história de amor sobre uma amiga de infância que parece um campo minado

altTitles.uk: Історія кохання з подругою дитинства, яка прив'язалася до мене

altTitles.id: Kisah Cinta Teman Masa Kecil yang Terlihat Berbahaya

description.en:
This is my love story with a landmine girl who's convinced that I'm her childhood friend.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://x.com/onnoveltet/status/1829430063294738758)
description.ja: 自分のことを幼馴染だと思い込んでいる地雷系女子との恋愛物語です。
description.pt-br: Esta é a minha história de amor com uma garota convencida de que sou seu amigo de infância.

description.en:
The power of Valhalla's warriors is called Saga. It is the mighty, magical power born from their achievements and deeds in their former lives. Thus, the more stories and legends of these warriors spread and linger in the hearts of many, the stronger their Saga becomes.

Tae Ho himself was certainly no warrior. However, he was the world's top professional gamer. In the game world of Dark Age, his character, Dragon Knight Kalsted could rightly be called a legend in his own right.

His achievements, his story.

All the accomplishments that the Dragon Knight Kalsted had accumulated in the game!
[Saga: Immortal Warrior] The story of the immortal warrior, Lee Tae Ho, unfolds on the battlefield of the gods, Valhalla. To put an end to Ragnarok, which threatens the world's very existence, a new Saga begins at this very moment.

altTitles.en: A Tale of a Small Town hardship in Sengoku Era - An Agriculture Comic

altTitles.ja: 戦国小町苦労譚 農耕戯画

altTitles.zh: 战国小町苦劳谭-农耕戏画

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés d'un village à l'époque Sengoku - Une histoire agricole

description.en:
One fateful day, a girl time slipped into the Sengoku Era. It was an abrupt enough event to be dubbed god’s whim, done to sate hellish boredom. The girl has no power to change the world.  
She was a very ordinary, common, and plain girl that can be found anywhere.  And that girl can do no more than a single thing...

Survive the Sengoku Era – that’s all.  
  


---

Adapted from [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8406bm/) (Raw)  
Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/62898/)  
Alternative Manga Raw: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3714)
description.fr: Shizuko est une lycéenne ordinaire avec des intérêts extraordinaires : l'Histoire et l'agricutlure. Ces passions vont peut-être lui sauver la vie : projetée à la période Sengoku, elle se retrouve au service d'un seigneur excentrique et exigeant : le fameux Oda Nobunaga. Obsédé par l'idée d'unifier le pays en proie aux guerres intestines, il entend bien faire usage des étranges compétences de cette fille venue d'ailleurs. Shizuko parviendra-t-elle à gagner sa confiance ? Retournera-t-elle à son époque ?

altTitles.en: Blossoms in Adversity

description.en:
Hwaimji was put to death due to her family's betrayal. A girl who was from a prestigious family a thousand years ago was reincarnated as Hwaji. She tried to live a comfortable life away from betrayals and dark battles... but the family fell apart in an instant, and Hwaji tried reestablish the family using the experiences of his previous life. And then, a man who is attracted to her, like fate, arrives in her unsuccessful life...

Note: This is based on a Chinese novel called The Story of Huazhi which has been adapted into a Chinese drama called, "Blossoms in Adversity."

altTitles.ja: ストランド

description.en: Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they don’t even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolers—and the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!

title.en: Ore no tomodachi ♂♀ ga kawai sugite komaru!

altTitles.en: 俺の友達♂♀が可愛すぎて困る！
My Childhood Friend Is So Cute, It's Frustrating!
I Am Worried That My Childhood Friend Is Too Cute!

altTitles.vi: Người bạn thời thơ ấu của tôi quá dễ thương!

description.en: "If my guy friend turned into a girl, he would be the perfect girlfriend!" Returning to his hometown after 10 years, Amano Koichi is thrilled to finally reunite with his childhood friend, Yukio Sawatari on the first day of school when suddenly, he turns female! Yukio is affected by "Sudden sex change syndrome", a rare condition present in one every ten thousand people which randomly changes their gender!Koichi can't help but be flustered by his childhood friend's cuteness. How will this complicate their relationship? Will it develop into a forbidden romance?! Find out in this exciting TSF Rom-com!
description.id:
Amano, yang kembali ke kota tempat dia tinggal sewaktu kecil untuk pertama kalinya setelah 10 tahun, bertemu Yukio Sawatari, seorang teman masa kecil di hari pertama pemindahan, ketika dia (seorang teman pria) menjadi wanita! Meskipun dia berbagi suka citanya, saat dia tiba-tiba berubah menjadi seorang gadis dan tidak bisa menyembunyikan rasa malunya. Yukio terkena penyakit seperti 100.000 orang lainnya, tiba-tiba menjadi seorang gadis yang disebut "spontaneous isomerism metamorphosis"!  
  
Teman masa kecil perempuan ♂ yang imut dan dalam kesulitan!? Cinta TSF (transeksual) Terlarang!  
  
Kalo gak paham baca ajalah, ada sinopsis juga gak guna.
description.vi:
Khi trở về thành phố nơi từng sống sau 10 năm, Amano Koichi đã gặp lại người bạn tuổi thơ là Yukio Sawatari vào ngày đầu tiên ở trường mới thì bỗng nhiên Yukio lại đổi giới tính?! Anh bị ảnh hưởng bởi một căn bệnh chỉ có trong một trong mười nghìn người gọi là "hội chứng đổi giới đột ngột"! 

Từ đây bắt đầu câu truyện về tình yêu với người bạn tuổi thơ đổi giới.
